title: Add app logo to the landing (Empty State) screen

requirements.text: Add the existing app logo image to the landing/empty-state screen (the screen shown before a user starts searching for a location), using the existing generated asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/weather-logo.dim_512x512.png`.

quotes: Can u add a logo to add a gone screen page

acceptanceCriteria: When the app first loads and the Empty State screen is shown, the logo is visible on that screen (in addition to the header).
The logo uses `/assets/generated/weather-logo.dim_512x512.png` and includes an appropriate English `alt` text (e.g., "Weather Gizmos logo").
Logo placement is responsive (looks good on mobile and desktop) and does not overlap the existing hero image, heading, body text, or the Search button.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only shadcn/ui components).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not change backend canister code or add new backend functionality.
Do not generate a new logo image; use the existing generated logo asset already in the project.
